AIAppUpdateProtocol Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in AIAppUpdateProtocol.h

– refresh: required method

Refreshes the appupdate info available in the server. Refresh will fail if appUpdate.serviceId is missing in appconfig or service discovery is not configured for appupdate or the content of the appupdate file is not in the specified format

- (void)refresh:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( AIAppUpdateRefreshStatus refreshResult , NSError *_Nullable error ))completionHandler

Parameters

completionHandler:

completionHandler with refresh status and error if refresh failed
